body_html:
You can fix it by applying

diff --git a/torch/lib/ATen/Half.h b/torch/lib/ATen/Half.h
index f090f350..3ded9a3a 100644
--- a/torch/lib/ATen/Half.h
+++ b/torch/lib/ATen/Half.h
@@ -1,6 +1,7 @@
 #pragma once
 
 #include <limits>
+#include <string>
 #include <stdint.h>
 #ifdef AT_CUDA_ENABLED
 #include <cuda.h>

but then you will hit #3199 which I am working on right now

body:
You can fix it by applying 

```
diff --git a/torch/lib/ATen/Half.h b/torch/lib/ATen/Half.h
index f090f350..3ded9a3a 100644
--- a/torch/lib/ATen/Half.h
+++ b/torch/lib/ATen/Half.h
@@ -1,6 +1,7 @@
 #pragma once
 
 #include <limits>
+#include <string>
 #include <stdint.h>
 #ifdef AT_CUDA_ENABLED
 #include <cuda.h>
```

but then you will hit #3199 which I am working on right now
